name: Is there a ubiquitous spectrolaminar motif of local field potential power across the primate neocortex?
citation: Mackey, Chase (2024) Is there a ubiquitous spectrolaminar motif of local field potential power across the primate neocortex? (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001283/draft
description: This is a dataset accompanying the preprint by Mackey et al. (2024) under the same title ("Is there a ubiquitous [...]"); DOI: 10.1101/2024.09.18.613490. See the README for details about the format of the data.
